Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Hotel Gromada Airport in Warsaw, you'll be connected to the convention center and convenient to Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre and Sluzewiec Racetrack. This hotel is within close proximity of Szczesliwice Ski Slope and Krolikarnia Palace.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 352 guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands. Additional features include shopping on site, wedding services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Warsaw? This hotel has 64583 square feet (6000 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space. Extended parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make yourself at home in one of the 352 guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary newspapers.

When you stay at Hotel Gromada Airport in Warsaw, you'll be connected to the convention center and convenient to Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre and Sluzewiec Racetrack. This hotel is within close proximity of Szczesliwice Ski Slope and Krolikarnia Palace.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Galeria Mokotow Shopping Centre - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Sluzewiec Racetrack - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Szczesliwice Ski Slope - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Krolikarnia Palace - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Wodny Park - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Blue City Shopping Centre - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
National Library of Poland - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Belweder Palace - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Warsaw University of Technology - 5.1 km / 3.1 mi
Frideric Chopin's Monument - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Warsaw International Expocentre - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Chancellery of Prime Minster of Poland - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Warsaw University Botanical Garden - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi
Lazienki Park - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
ORCO Tower - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Gromada Airport is Warsaw (WAW-Frederic Chopin) - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
